Reviews.Title: Great Buy from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Woll
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product after researching all on the web and in local stores.  This was the best deal for a great product that I could find.  It included many extras that were only available locally at additional cost.  This deal for all was less than the camera and one lens in local stores.  It came right on time and in great condition.  I have already used it several times and works great.  As soon as I learn all the features and their function it should be even better.  Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: Must buy
Reviews.Author: G. Lambert "Mr Negative"
Reviews.Content: I looked around all over the net and this was the best deal I could find. Super fast shipment and when I opened the box it felt like Christmas. Far exceeded my expectations. If interested in this camera, I would look no further and buy now.

Reviews.Title: love!
Reviews.Author: mollie
Reviews.Content: I am a total beginner, and this camera is absolutely awesome! the quality of the pics are amazing, and all of the accessories are great! for this price, you wont get a better deal. Im very happy

Reviews.Title: best deal found on web
Reviews.Author: luis86
Reviews.Content: This is the best deal found on web, it has everything as described, the canon takes great pictures and is  easy to use, i take it with me everywhere, and the spare battery last more time than the original, love to shoot by viewfinder instead fo using directview,  manual focusing with the telephoto zoom lens is better. But if your looking to buy it for wildlife shooting or kids, is better to buy the kit that comes with the 55-250 mm zoons len, it has image stabilization system and works better when the object is quite far away from you or moving, if you buy this kit with the 75-300mm lens will have to program the continuous shooting to avoiding camera shake and blurry pictures.  So far this is the best deal found for the price and items...

Reviews.Title: Canon T3 review
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with my Canon T3 camera. It came to me just as described. Takes beautiful, clear pictures. Have taken pictures in the sunshine, low light, action pictures and they have all turned out great. Still learning how to use the different features but am very pleased with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Be Happier
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: I was leery to find such a great price for everything in the Canon EOS Rebel T3 bundle, but after I read Cameta Camera's policy I felt great about my products! Everything came as it described and in great condition! Shipping was faster than I could have hoped! My camera works great and it came with all the instruction books, CDs, USB port,ect. I am glad I made the decision to get a Canon EOS Rebel T3 and to order it through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Nothing compares to this!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have never been more pleased with an online product and first time user of Amazon in my life!  From the price, to the ordering and to the unbelievable shipping and receiving to my front door.  Enough of that, if one were to price this out piece by piece you would easily pay twice as much.  I received my order in 4 days on July 3rd. This worked out perfect because I was able to capture the fireworks with the night vision setting.  I have a lot to learn about all of the incredible functions that this camera has.  But for the first night right out of the box it was great.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Feather
Reviews.Content: We were a little skeptical when we ordered this camera due to the price.  But we were very pleased.  Great product, for our amateur abilities, and a lot for the money.

Reviews.Title: Happy Consumer
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: Im very happy with this purchase. I was switching from a point and shoot just looking for something a little more powerful as the kids get older. This was a fantastic buy. The camera is pretty easy to use. There are still some things that came in the whole kit that I need to learn how to use but the camera takes beautiful photos.

Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: bsmith
Reviews.Content: I ordered this canon package and received it within 48 hours on standard shipping. Wow! Additionally, each item was carefully wrapped and packaged to ensure the only way to damage the camera and equipment was to throw it off a bridge. I also did not expect (but was pleasantly surprised to find) all of the equipment fit in the camera bag except for the tripod, of course. One of the batteries was partially charged so I could test it out right away.

Reviews.Title: You won't be disappointed!
Reviews.Author: N. Richardson
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my wife, and she couldn't be happier!You will not find a better deal than this. Everything neatly packaged, well protected, and still in retail packaging. All items are exactly as described, and all fit nicely into the included carrying bag.Camera takes excellent pictures, and additional lenses are a MUST HAVE for everyone.Thank you Cameta for putting this bundle together!!!

Reviews.Title: this is fabulas
Reviews.Author: Ronald Maddox
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera, it has all the bells and whisles, it takes great pictures for sports and any other type event. the photos are great i recommend this camera. the package deal had everything. my grand son is in to sports and we take pictures of the hole team and put them on line so the parents that couldn't go watch their kids can tag the photos everyone is very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Step up to a DSLR
Reviews.Author: Neil.
Reviews.Content: Making the step-up from a point and shoot to a DSLR? This is a fabulous entry level Canon camera. The learning curve is minimal and generally speaking the T3 is user friendly. This bundle includes the T3 body (12.2MP), standard 18-55mm lens and also included is a 75-300mm lens plus everything else listed.For a novice, this bundle has some serious bang for your buck and enough features and gadgets to keep you interested and engaged. If you're pursuing photography as a hobby look no further, this get's you up and shooting as soon as the battery('s) are charged and without breaking the bank.My previous camera was (is) a Kodak Easyshare DX6490 4 MP Digital Camera with 10xOptical Zoom which I still use because it does take phenomenal pic's, however it isn't a DSLR and isn't as robust or versatile.

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny.
Reviews.Author: Thaley17
Reviews.Content: So to start this review off i would like to say that I am very new to DSLR Camera's and Photography in general. I am the type of person to read tons of reviews and forums on a product before I go and drop $600.00. Saying that; this package deal is worth every penny i spent. I have had my camera for about 2 weeks now and I love it. I'm still getting use the camera but it is truly and amazing camera. When i received the package i was blown away with the amount of extras that where in the box. I was looking at each one of these extras online and the total was over $900.00. So i would highly recommend this package to anyone that is wanting to get into Photography and wants a starter kit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent VFM
Reviews.Author: Karthik
Reviews.Content: Purchased a year back. Value for Money purchase. Love my first DSLR camera. Memory card, camera bag and tripod are great bonus.

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Samuel C. Livesay "DianaL"
Reviews.Content: i had my worries when i decided to order this bundle, but it turned out to be the best purchased ive ever made. im not a pro when it comes about SLR cameras, but the T3 is perfect for professional photographers or begginers. im an intermediate photographer and future photography student and i know this is going to be my best friend for a long time. the camera works great, it has plenty of options to play with, and accesorries that will be lifesavers when you dont have local stores that offer them around you. i still have to learn all its functions, but i can say the image quality this camera gives is exceptional. you get 4 lens to play with. the 300mm doesnt have an image stabilizator, but if you dont mind manual work and continuous shooting you'll find it useful. it doesnt zoom as much as i thought but its still great for medium distance. if you have shaky hands like me you will absolutely love the tripod. i never used tripods before, but this camera can be very heavy with the 300mm on and the tripod's a life saver. i had a little trouble with the card reader because i barely pulled the card out of it, i didnt put it in wrong because my computer read it without problems.also i didnt really know how to use the 2 extra lens at first. they pretty much screw on the default lens like a lid. theres a macro piece that you have to unscrew off the lens and use them alone . they catch beautiful macros. but make sure you're not all the way zoomed out when you use the extra lens because they create a little vignette. stay zoomed in a little and should fix the problem dont be afraid making this investment. its great in long run and easy to learn. it has manuals that will help you and you'll get everything for just the price of the camera

Reviews.Title: All great, but 1 item!
Reviews.Author: Very Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Content: Everything was fantastic including the customer service, but the telephoto and wide-angle lens kit that comes with it is terrible! I sent it back and got a refund of $19.95 for the telephoto and wide-angle lens kit. In the description of the package deal, it says these lens attachments are Precision Design brand. The brand they came packaged in says ZEIKOS. Look up reviews about the "Zeikos wide angle and telephoto lens kit" and you will see that across the board customers think it is terrible! Maybe they can remove the terrible wide angle and telephoto lens kit and reduce the package deal by $20? It would have eliminated a lot of hassle for me to ship it back.Everything else was fantastic! Great, easy to use camera that can do everything the basic photographer would like it to do and more. Comes with everything one needs to get started and everything is pretty good quality for the money. Cameta Camera also had fabulous customer service. I would do business with them again anytime!

Reviews.Title: Great deal with great pricing
Reviews.Author: saurabh purnaye
Reviews.Content: I got all related small/big items in a single order related to the camera..Its good deal with excellent shipping speed and handling.. Thanks for the same

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: We have just started using the camera so have only used the basics.  But so far it's been easy to use and the pictures turn out great.  Very happy with all of the extras that came with the camera.  Looking forward to learning all of the other features.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Thomas W.
Reviews.Content: Just getting started with this style of camera it this is one of the easiest cameras to work and love the quality of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Torres
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I was looking for and everything came in perfect condition! Thank you so much for this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Great camera pack for the price
Reviews.Author: PJ Braun
Reviews.Content: It takes great photos, no problems with it so far, the pack is nice and the wife likes it, 'nuff said.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: CJM515
Reviews.Content: You get a bunch of different useful items in this package deal. Everything in the package is of very good quality. The camera itself take very clear, crisp pictures and is easy to use. We have been taking pictures of our son and its finally nice just to be able to snap the picture and catch what he is doing in the moment. We have been using a regular digital camera and by the time that camera finally snapped the picture our son was already doing something else and then the picture would be blurry. Not anymore. This camera can catch him running and snap photos as fast as he can move, Overall this whole package is amazing. Nothing in it i can say is just a filler. You will find use for it all. I would think even someone who does photo/camera stuff proffesionally would find this package pretty impressive.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Andrea Kristiansen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I am still getting used to it. It is much more advanced than the cameras I have owned in the past. I would recommend this camera to anyone that is looking to take beautiful pictures with ease. This camera can be complicated if you make it that way, but the automatic settings are perfect for starting out and transitioning into in-depth photography.

Reviews.Title: Great camera package deal for price!
Reviews.Author: pink78108
Reviews.Content: This is a really good camera. So far it has worked great, (although I haven't had it too long). The quality is great! The 12.2 MP is definitely enough and the tripod and telephoto lens is an extra benefit. The reviews I read prior to this purchase mentioned the tripod was weak but I was very impressed with its sturdiness. Plus it stretches out 3 times and can rotate the camera 180 degrees to get the right alignment. I recommend this camera. It takes some getting used to how to operate al the features, but when you do it's a lot of fun!

Reviews.Title: Rayj
Reviews.Author: Rayj5866
Reviews.Content: I purchased and have been using a Canon EOS Élan II E about 15 yrs. ago and have had great results since. I have been wanting to purchase a dslr for a few years now and since the arrival of the first grandchild a few months ago I thought this would be the time. I also knew it would be another Canon. While I have only owned this camera a short time, it was easy to jump right in and start working with it. This camera has plenty of bells and whistles to keep me learning and improving my photography skills without being overwhelmed with the new format. Very pleased with everything and having been a previous Canon slr user, I'm sure this camera will meet all my needs for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Best deal you can get. !
Reviews.Author: Peter Gen
Reviews.Content: Great value and excellent new condition items inside of a huge package. Everything you need to professional photography.Hi quality camera images, very easy to use and great options considering all stuff inside.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle, great price!
Reviews.Author: Claudia P.
Reviews.Content: This bundle is great! I ordered it on a Sunday and it came on Friday. It definitely was a great price for all the extra stuff it came with. The camera is very nice. Takes good photos and I like that it comes with two lenses, very handy. The camera bag it comes with is nice and good quality. I like how it zips instead of buckles and it's a nice size, too. The seller had fogotten to put the wide angle lens and telephoto lens and the spare battery in the package, though. We had to contact them and they sent the missing pieces immediately! The only negative that I would say is the tripod is sort of cheap. It doesn't feel sturdy to me but I have another tripod so it wasn't a big deal. Overall this product is awesome and worth it!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: it was a great purchase for the amount of items i received and for the amount of money i paid. it works exactly with my business

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 kit.
Reviews.Author: Danielle P.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this since it was such a great deal, and I couldn't be happier!  The camera arrived fast and in excellent condition, well packed so it didn't get damaged. I have taken at least 300 pictures so far and I am a beginner but I look like a pro due to the quality of the pictures it takes.  If you are looking for a great deal then this is the deal for you!

Reviews.Title: The Canon T3 is my dream camera~!
Reviews.Author: infohunter
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied with this purchase~!This kit does everything I want it to, and more.Came with an extra battery and charger and is a must have.I wish Canon had made a remote for it...The kit did not come with an external light meter, but the camera has one and does a good job.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Tabby alexander
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. its AMAZING. all the products it comes with are great, and for an amazing price. A friend of mine bought this camera and some of the same accessories separately and paid twice the price, and i got twice the stuff lol i totally recommend the product. I live all the way in japan and it got here safely within a week. amazing amazing amazing!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: LZMBASS
Reviews.Content: This package is the most you could get for your money and then more. I was shocked at the 4 lenses that came with the camera, the real tripod, UV filters, cleaning kit-14 things in all. The camera is wonderful. I just have to learn how to use it. I ordered this kit on a Sunday and it was delivered to me two days later. When Cameta says they have what you need, they mean it. Very good service and products. In reality it is too much camera for me but I will learn how to use it. Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: First and ONLY!
Reviews.Author: GaryB
Reviews.Content: Received MY Canon EOS Rebel T3 days before it was estimated and I am in love with camera. In fact, I am in love with this bundle. You won't find a better deal anywhere else. 4 Lenses, 2 filters, cleaning kit, extra battery and the list continues.I researched this camera left and right before purchasing. So glad I did. Amazing quality pictures and video. Easy to use and with Canons Digital Learning Center, I am starting to learn even more.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle for the price
Reviews.Author: sue
Reviews.Content: I am new to SLR cameras, but love my point and shoot Canon camera. My old Canon has always produced great photos. I wanted to be able to zoom in and and take sports photos.The picture quality of this model is awesome so far. The accessories are useful as well.No complaints...

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Ward
Reviews.Content: This is not a professional model but for an amature it is an awesome piece. It does have many professional features but easy to understand for a beginner!! Comming from the SLR worls I find this very easy to operate and not hard at all to get into advanced features. For the price it's worth it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The set came with all the advertised parts. I have used it for a few test shots and am satisfied so far. I have not done a full session with the camera yet. I received in less time than expected although I had it shipped by regular shipping method. The camera kit was well packaged.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Emashburn
Reviews.Content: I borrowed this product from a family member and after returning it I HAD TO OWN ONE!!  I am not a professional and only take pics for fun but this camera makes my pictures look like a pro's!  Simple if I need it to be and complex for later when I learn everything I need to know.  CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE, believe me I tried!!!!

Reviews.Title: great customer service
Reviews.Author: Barb E
Reviews.Content: I had some questions about the extra add on lenses and my email was promptly returned along with a follow up phone call. Rich explained how the lenses fit and best use for them and gave me all the answers I needed to this and additional questions. I am completely satisfied. Also the product came much before the expected delivery date and all was in good shape.

Reviews.Title: I'm so pleased
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for this product, I have already started to use it and am not disappointed. I have much to learn about it and am excited to do so.And the price, I could not believe it when I opened the box, it was like Christmas morning. Thank you.I have forwarded this info to friends.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: kayrene11
Reviews.Content: Besides a little bit of damage to the box, this was defiantly what I was looking for. Nothing was damaged inside, and everything was accounted for. I'm still new at photography but my pictures are looking good.

Reviews.Title: Great starter camera/gift
Reviews.Author: maclemen
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my boyfriend after he'd been eyeing it for about 5 months. Resolution is great, tri-pod is a steal! Pretty good package for the price. We haven't used the filters yet but they seem like fun. It arrived in one huge box which makes for a pretty fun gift when it's all wrapped up. Canon provide the warranty so register your product before you forget, and receive discounts on other lenses!Be careful when using outside. We went snow shoeing and kept it in it's case with the lense cap on the whole time but moisture still got in the lense...don't wory thought, just put it in a warm dry room and you'll be back in action!Overall, great starter camera for someone looking for something a step or two above a really nice point and shoot. (autofocus great for beginning photographers)

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: DKJ
Reviews.Content: Great Buy. Arrived timely, in good condition and has everything to start taking photos. Can't beat the price for all you get.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Vendor!
Reviews.Author: Stuart Uffner
Reviews.Content: Delivered order on time and were helpful over the phone with tech support. I am hopeful that they will be helpful in the future with tips on using the equipemnt because i am a novice.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Nancy B Walsh
Reviews.Content: Bought for my daughter as a gift and she loves it! I'm glad it was a package with all the items.  Saved time and money!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ashley Siron
Reviews.Content: Everything that was listed was perfect. It's an amazing camera and works like a charm. Haven't put it down since I got it. Very easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Pamela Blessinger
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a great deal.  More for my money than any other site or posting.  Learning how to use the camera and its lenses.  My wife seems happy, so I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: Jessie Cottrell
Reviews.Content: It was a great purchase. It's a really nice camera. It had a lot of great options and extras with it.

Reviews.Title: Ideal camera and accessories!
Reviews.Author: Wife
Reviews.Content: I was exceptionally pleased with this product. It was a gift for my husband who was looking for a better camera. He couldn't be happier with this and is taking his time figuring out how to use everything. The set came quickly and was carefully packaged with the content individually wrapped. I would use this company again!

Reviews.Title: Super excited
Reviews.Author: Brandi
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 16 year old daughter, and she loves it! It really takes awesome pictures, it will definitly be used a lot .

Reviews.Title: my brother has not put it down yet
Reviews.Author: Mike Kneen
Reviews.Content: This has got to be one of the best items I have ever purchased online. Got an item more than purchased.

Reviews.Title: great starter package.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: everything described is included and this is a great starter package.  You have to consider if you plan to be more of a professional, this may be too basic for you. if you want something better than a point and shoot camera but you probably are not going to be too technical in photography, this is the product for you.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Daniel P. Healy
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife to replace a canon AE1 that was about 30 years old. She really likes this new camera and finds all the features easy to use. The pictures come out great and the camera seems to be made well.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, good value.
Reviews.Author: Lori Griffith
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera now for over a year and absolutely in love with it. Pictures and video are excellent.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: great deal for the money ... wish I would of waited a little longer though and for the 4t cause it went on sale right after I bought this one. but you get sooooo much in this deal and its a great camera for a first timer

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Exactly what i needed for class. Great deal! i cant belive how much i got for how much i spent... it makes me wonder how the 47th st photo makes money.

Reviews.Title: fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Shirley Mouse
Reviews.Content: Someone I know mentioned this camera as a good one if going digital.  I had used a Nikon FG film camera for about 25 years and I'd say this Canon really can replace it.  The software package that's included is great also.  I did get a higher quality zoom lens though so I don't have to keep swapping lens.  However, both lens that are included are good quality.

Reviews.Title: OK for an amateur
Reviews.Author: L. E. A. M "luiser"
Reviews.Content: This "combo" is OK for an amateur. If you are looking for professional things, this is not the product you should buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Ashley Daugherty
Reviews.Content: I got pretty much everything I wanted out of this kit. The camera is great, lenses are great, everything has worked out really well. The only issue I have is that the tripod that came with this is very poor. It broke after just 2 uses, but that is to be expected with a package such as this. This is a really great value, even if it just included the camera body and 2 lenses, you're still saving a LOT of money doing this.

Reviews.Title: As promised
Reviews.Author: Jon Silber
Reviews.Content: As promised - well done. I guess I need to write more words - so - I would use these folks again.

Reviews.Title: Good and sound
Reviews.Author: Arun Karunakaran
Reviews.Content: When considering the starters this is good deal. two lens for the price.  But still the quality of the bag is not good. Other than that every thing is fine.

Reviews.Title: Great product...but beware this is the T3 NOT the T3i
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic product with great quality basic accessories. Has all the basics you need to get started and I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of what I got for the price. The seller is fantastic as well and has great customer service. I know this because I didn't mean to order this product. I meant to order the Canon Rebel T3i (this package is the T3)...I had specifically researched it because I do videography for my job. I wanted a microphone input and a flip screen. I opened this package and couldn't find the mic input--my heart sunk when I realized I picked the wrong one. I need a crisp audio channel for what I do professionally--so alas, I had to send this whole thing back.  The customer service was fantastic though...and I am very grateful for that! If you're not planning on doing video, however, or you're not concerned about having a separate audio channel for a microphone...it's a great camera for less than the T3i (and a fabulous package as well!). If I was just using this for still photos...I'd probably have kept this package. But make sure you check and order the right camera! :)

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Ethan
Reviews.Content: Everything about this package deal is perfect. More than all the items and equipment you need to get started in photogarphy. The camera itself and the lens are amazing. very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Package!
Reviews.Author: The Paghs
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic package. All items are excellent quality. Everything you need to get started! I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Binky762 "Binky"
Reviews.Content: This was a great starter kit for the price!  The lenses, tripod, SD card and other accessories are good quality for an excellent price!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Kessinger
Reviews.Content: Great Canon quality mixed with a good combination of a basic setup for a starter DIGITAL camera system. Canon always delivers..

Reviews.Title: Love this package!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Henderson
Reviews.Content: I received this package very quickly, and it was everything it was advertised to be! I'm very pleased with the contents of the package, and the quality of photos this camera takes. Its definitely a great value for the money!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Ryan Torrens
Reviews.Content: The cannon T3i is my first professional camera and may I say, I am never going back to little digital cameras after the experience I am having with my T3i. The T3i is defiantly something that I would suggest anyone to buy. I can't stop telling everyone that I am in love with my camera. By the way if you are reading this you are invited to my wedding with it. Overall, this camera is amazing and I recommend it to anyone looking for a great camera at a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: SuperGirl
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this package & the seller! I love the camera (as a beginner) & all the accessories it comes with!  Highly recommend buying from them!

Reviews.Title: Neat Camera
Reviews.Author: Pat Stokes
Reviews.Content: Love this camera......great price too.  My kids use it more than I do.  I recomend this to anyone , it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product & service
Reviews.Author: Matias Panario
Reviews.Content: The product has arrived in the time they have mentioned and including all the items from the bundle. Everything was perfect. Thanks again.Regards,Matías

Reviews.Title: a ok
Reviews.Author: EDWARD SANDERS
Reviews.Content: a ok great deal and a great camera ---can do a lot more than i could with a simple digital

Reviews.Title: Love camera-dislike manual
Reviews.Author: dlewis
Reviews.Content: Love the camera, but I am a novice.  The manual is very little help and small print.  It is hard to see pictures and item it is covering.  I searched on line and ended up purchasing 2 other instruction books.  When you spend a lot on a product, the manual and instructions should be very clear and helpful.  Love the camera, but give the manual very poor marks.  It gave info regarding camera but very little help in using the product successfully.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Elaine Lowe
Reviews.Content: Can't find enough adjectives to describe how much I love my Canon camera.  I have used it at family functions, vacation to wildlife area, taking portraits, etc, etc.  I have been wanting a SLR camera for a long time and just didn't have the funds.  I found this awesome deal with everything I could even think of getting at half the cost anywhere I checked.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: This was a complete and very usable unit
Reviews.Author: Russ
Reviews.Content: Great camera and additional pieces. This unit really works well for my family.It was a very good choice for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I baught this camera outfit for my wife for Christmas. It came on time and everything works great. We have spent a lot of time making memories with the whole family

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Michelle A
Reviews.Content: Definitely a great package deal.  I have wanted this camera for a while and was very pleased to find the package with all the extra accessories for such a great price.  Delivery was prompt and very securely packaged.This is my first DSLR camera, but I was able to take some amazing pictures of Kite Surfers the very first time using it.  I have a lot to learn and bought an additional (independent) instruction guide to accompany the manufacturer's DVD manual.  I haven't had much success with the (2) additional add-on lenses, but this is probably my lack of experience.  All-in-all this is a great package deal!!

Reviews.Title: Loved the camera; expedited shipping; sturdy packaging
Reviews.Author: Hitesh Patel
Reviews.Content: Used the camera on a trip to Central America.  Easy to use; light weight; had everything i needed. Still learning all the functions, but was able to get great pictures of wildlife.  Excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: cannon Rebel
Reviews.Author: Amy Baker
Reviews.Content: Great Camera. everything worked like it supposed to.. loved all the extra equipment. this is a great product.. everything works like it should.

Reviews.Title: My wife Loves it
Reviews.Author: Rrock
Reviews.Content: It made my wife very happy.  She really loves her new camera.Everything about the camera was easy to use and made great pictures.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mike Rhame
Reviews.Content: Takes fantastic pictures. Bought it for my wife and she loves it. My brother and sister in law are going to get one. Highly reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: best purchase
Reviews.Author: palmercl
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased this bundle. It had everything I wanted plus more. People have asked me about it and i know two people have purchased the same bundle and are glad they did as well. Worth the money!

Reviews.Title: work great
Reviews.Author: dan steele
Reviews.Content: camera was great, every thing was perfect, My son had no trouble putting everything together and was taking pic in no time

Reviews.Title: My first digital SLR camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome - I'm going to have such fun learning how to use it better.  I got the whole kit so 3 more lenses and extra materials.  The camera bag is really nice - strong and plenty of room.I got the Rebel T3 for Dummies book - great way to learn.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Package
Reviews.Author: Lori Gaffney
Reviews.Content: 16 yr old daughter bought this (after saving  $$$ up for it for years) to pursue her love of photography.  This package is well worth the money!  It has everything imaginable and more.  My daughter loves it.  The pictures are fantastic, the variety of lens is incredible - they alone are over $150 separately, and it comes with a tripod!  This is a great package to begin your photography hobby or business, I think.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: AIPO
Reviews.Content: This is the most amazing bundle price-benefit available, i am beginning in photography, and this is a very nice way to be more enthusiastic, also the different lenses included in the bundle give me more options, and encourage me to learn more.

Reviews.Title: What an AMAZING deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Camille
Reviews.Content: I cannot begin to describe how happy I am with this product.  Like many people who have bought this camera bundle, I thought surely this must be too good to be true.  How can they really be selling all of this equipment at such a low cost.  I decided to take a chance and purchase it, and boy am I happy I did.  I have spent the last six hours in gadget heaven, playing with everything that came with the camera.  Opening the box was like Christmas came a few months early.  EVERYTHING was exactly as it was described, brand new, with warranties, packaged with the utmost care and delivered to me even BEFORE the first day in the delivery range.  The package was scheduled to arrive between the 25th and 28th of September.  Cameta Camera shipped the package on the 21st, and I received it THE NEXT DAY!!!  I was completely shocked...and happy beyond words.  I would definitely recommend this camera and accessories package deal to anyone.  And FYI, the camera takes phenomenal pictures.  I'm in love! BUY THIS!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "amazonfan"
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this camera for a belated birthday gift, it is much like his, and I enjoyed using his so much on our roadtrip earlier this summer, that he bought me one just like it. I am enjoying it immensely, and can't wait to really get to use it on our next mini vacation in October with the fall foliage.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS set a big hit!
Reviews.Author: C. Whaley
Reviews.Content: Quick service and LOTS of great accessories with my new camera.  Can't wait to learn all the things I can do with it.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: H. Z. Aguirre
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best deal you can get if you want to start making picture or exploring film projects.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL W. BAZELL
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS JUST WONDERFUL, BEAUTIFUL PICTURES, AND YOU DON'T NEED TO BE A PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGARPHER TO USE IT. IF YOU WANT CLEAR CRISP PICTURES AND COLORS THAT ARE BEAUTIFUL. GET THIS CAMERA KIT FOR THE PRICE IT'S AWESOME

Reviews.Title: Simmons family
Reviews.Author: Laquatta Simmons
Reviews.Content: It was a great gift for my daughter who serve in the air force and is traveling a lot she said that is one of the fastest camera's she ever had and it takes great pictures

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Guillermo Abel
Reviews.Content: I baught  this product with original battery and one more, but in the box It was only one. I don't know where make a claim.

Reviews.Title: Cannon camera
Reviews.Author: ambition
Reviews.Content: Love this bundle! Still learning all there is. I have taken beautiful pictures already! Great value for the money! Love!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: leli
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera for 2 weeks I am very pleased with it. It come with a lot of grear things that all make I even greater!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: My husband loves it! Everything arrived safe & in one piece! He has been taking pictures non stop! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Christy T
Reviews.Content: This camera package was amazing. Would have cost me hundreds more had I gone somewhere else. Came with everything you need. Seriously shocked by all it came with. Love Love Love it great deal.

Reviews.Title: great buy! I bought this as a gift and was amazes at everything that was included.
Reviews.Author: Celeste M. Rogers "Fritz Rogers"
Reviews.Content: i would recommend this for any beginning photographer--two filters, a tripod, case memory card and card readers are just a few of the items included in this set.  WOW!

Reviews.Title: dream come true
Reviews.Author: Eulalio Guevara
Reviews.Content: im a beginner amd this kit is simply awesome, i used for the holydays and the result is remarkable many pieces together in order to get great pictures at an incredible price!

Reviews.Title: Mixed Bag
Reviews.Author: Stefan Schuber "sschuber"
Reviews.Content: This is a good assembly of products, and I commend the vendor (even though the assembly arrived in 2 packages without an explanation or note -- at least they took the time to check to ensure that everything was fine after I received the second package). The camera itself is very nice, and at this point I'm still learning about how to manipulate it for best photographs. I knocked off a star because the process of registering and trying to join the Canon online apparatus was time consuming, frustrating, and ultimately unsuccessful and I still haven't received follow-up assistance from Canon. If potential purchasers are good photographers who know how to operate a moderately sophisticated camera, have the resources to learn on their own, or are inspired tinkerers then this package will be useful and rewarding. Those who would like a little help to improve their photographic skills might want to consider buying this package and taking a course (eg, at the local community college or from a local camera store). Others may be somewhat disappointed. Lest this sound too critical let me reiterate that the camera and associated equipment are very nice, so if potential purchasers are interested only in the hardware this may be a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: Great deal, definitely getting your moneys worth. Lots of neat features. First "real" camera so not much to compare it too.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: randy pryor
Reviews.Content: Not sure why but pictures just don't look good, I had the Rebel T3i 18 mp  but took it back to store because this seem to be a great deal plus I read the 12 mp pictures would come out better than the 18 mp because the 18 mp was cramming to much into a picture.the pictures are just not there with this camera at all, they look no better than the $99.00 Nikon I use to have. Don't no if i got a bad one or what ? Wish I had kept the t3i now, Them were some great  picturesps.I also bought a Sigma 10-20mm f/4-5.6 EX DC HSM Lens And even with this $500.00  lens Pictures suck
